article.title: Harris Corporation Awarded $140 Million Order From National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Harris Corporation has received a $140 million order to provide systems integration and information technology services to the National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency (NGA). Harris Corporation will provide core information technology and integration services to assist the NGA in its transition to a modern infrastructure service provider and an application service provider environment.
